programme.title: American Mary
programme.desc: Mary Mason (Katharine Isabelle) is lured into a world of freakish surgeries for easy money.

programme.title: Piranha
programme.desc: Two people (Bradford Dillman, Heather Menzies) unwittingly free a mad military scientist's (Kevin McCarthy) mutant fish near a summer camp and resort lake.

programme.title: Humanoids From the Deep
programme.desc: A fisherman (Doug McClure) and a scientist (Ann Turkel) fight back when mossy sea monsters assault women.

programme.title: Sleepaway Camp
programme.desc: Bunks and the showers are a mad stabber's beat at a summer camp strictly for teens.

programme.title: Attack of the Giant Leeches
programme.desc: A bartender sends his wife (Yvette Vickers) and her lover (Michael Emmet) into a swamp where large smart leeches lurk.

programme.title: Becoming Evil: Serial Killers
programme.sub-title: The Second Wave: America's Most Notorious Serial Killers
programme.desc: After surviving the Great Depression and World War II, America entered an idyllic age, The Atomic Age, where wholesome values and classic Americana were king.

programme.title: Blank
programme.desc: After checking in at an AI-operated writer's retreat, Claire finds herself trapped in her unit with a malfunctioning android. As her captor becomes increasingly unstable, she has to outsmart the technology to make it out alive.

programme.title: Evil Dead Trap
programme.desc: A talk-show hostess (Miyuki Ono) and her crew investigate when she receives a graphic snuff video.

programme.title: Shocking Dark
programme.desc: A team of soldiers and civilians are sent to Venice to investigate the mysterious deaths of scientists who are trying to clean polluted waters.

programme.title: The Island
programme.desc: The situation on the deserted island slowly escalates; the mystery of the yellow man is solved, but a new threat comes to those who stayed behind.

programme.title: The Island
programme.desc: Social worker Freja is having increasing trouble keeping her group of juvenile delinquents under control; the argument with Devid intensifies.

programme.title: Bloody Bites
programme.sub-title: The Beast Will Kill Us All
programme.desc: A compilation of snack-sized horror films to disturb genre fans across the world.
